department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Cost-effective maintenance and minor improvements services for Crown owned portfolio
description: This amendment extends the closing time of the procurement to December 19th, 2023 at 14:00 EST. Please note that this requirement is for the Canadian Forces Housing Agency (CFHA) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND).
tags: Electrical equipment maintenance and repair service
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Responsive Maintenance Services - CFHA - Borden
### Tender Reference: WS4234336847

#### Tender Status: Statement of Work

We invite you to submit a bid for the provision of responsive maintenance services to the Canadian Forces Housing Agency (CFHA) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND). This tender has been issued for the operation of Crown-owned properties in accordance with the attached Annex A - Statement of Work.

#### Objective
* To provide cost-effective maintenance and minor improvement services to the Crown-owned portfolio
* To ensure compliance with all regulatory requirements

### Eligibility and Documentation

Bid submissions are due by December 19th, 2023 at 14:00 EST. To be considered, your bid must include a comprehensive understanding of the required services and evidence of your company's ability to fulfill the Statement of Work. You may also be required to submit additional documentation to support your bid.

### Teleconference
We are hosting a mandatory teleconference on November 14th, 2023 at 13:00 pm EST in English, and an optional teleconference on November 15th, 2023 at 13:00 pm EST in French. You must participate in the teleconference and confirm attendance to this bid opportunity by emailing the Contracting Authority no later than November 8th, 2023 at 14:00 EST.

### Tender Details

* Tender reference: WS4234336847
* Closing date: December 19th, 2023 at 14:00 EST
* Expected contract start date: April 1st, 2024
* Expected contract end date: March 31st, 2026
* Tender notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17900563
* Contact information: Martin Gauthier, martin.gauthier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Please find attached the documenting required for this bid opportunity, including the Statement of Work. If you have any inquiries, please reach out to us in advance to ensure we can address your questions. Your bid submission must be comprehensive and include all necessary details, documentation, and evidence of your company's capacity to fulfill the Statement of Work. We look forward to reviewing your bids. [1] [2]

 

Note that a dictionary may be useful to double check terminology as written French is assumed in the original, whereas I rewrote as professionally written English. 

The "Notice URL" is left out since there seems to exist
